title: New Story (YC S15) Is Hiring Senior Manager Direct Builds
description: ABOUT THE ROLE New Story is on a mission to end global homelessness! We're looking for an ambitious, entrepreneurial leader that's excited to take on a challenging and massively impactful opportunity. Since New Story started in 2014, we have built over 38 communities across 4 countries resulting in over 14,000 lives impacted through safe housing via our community and home building program, what we call Direct Builds. Check out our work here and here and here. The Impact Operations Leader owns and is responsible for our Direct Build program success and operations. Your leadership and execution will result in high-quality homes for people living within inadequate shelter and your role is to ensure New Story is achieving our Direct Build goals with integrity and excellence. Youâ€™ll work closely with the Chief Impact Officer and Direct Builds team to execute on world class communities and homes for very low income families. From land vetting, management of our urban design contractors,
